text: Pavel Kurakin (; born 3 December 1966 in Kolchugino) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:People from Kolchugino, Vladimir Oblast Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC KAMAZ Naberezhnye Chelny players Category:Russian footballers Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Association football defenders
title: Pavel Kurakin
